tracks.title: Senior Runtime Architect â€“ Java Systems at Scale
tracks.summary: Design and defend Java backend systems that stay fast, safe, and operable as they grow.

quests.title: Force-Field Boundaries
quests.summary: Define service boundaries, modules, and contracts for a growing Java platform.
quests.objective: A clear architecture narrative that explains where code lives, how services talk, and how change risk is contained.

quests.title: Taming the JVM
quests.summary: Diagnose performance issues using GC logs, profiles, and JVM flags.
quests.objective: A performance plan showing how you'd profile, interpret GC behavior, and choose JVM settings for predictable latency.

quests.title: Threads, Pools, and Storms
quests.summary: Design concurrency strategies and resilience patterns under load.
quests.objective: A concurrency/resilience design that covers thread pools, async flows, backpressure, and failure isolation.

quests.title: Contracts Under Pressure
quests.summary: Keep APIs evolving without breaking downstream teams.
quests.objective: A versioning and compatibility strategy for REST/JSON (or gRPC) APIs under frequent change.

quests.title: Runtime Under Fire
quests.summary: Debug, triage, and learn from JVM incidents.
quests.objective: An incident run-through with thread dumps, metrics, logs, root cause, and changes to prevent recurrence.

bosses.title: Reactor Runtime Arbiter
bosses.summary: Judges your ability to design and defend high-scale JVM architectures.
